items.sentence: Tom had never seen a girl as beautiful as Mary before.
Tom and a few others are waiting for you on the porch.
Tom applied for a credit card, but he was turned down.
This is the kind of music that Tom likes to listen to.
Three missionaries were killed and eaten by cannibals.
Tom and Mary eat dinner together almost every evening.
Tom asked his father to give him some money for lunch.
Tom has become a vegetarian and has also quit smoking.
Tom has been engaged to Mary for at least half a year.
Now that he is old, it is your duty to look after him.
I bet you think I\'m just writing that to impress you.
Tom\'s death has been officially ruled as an accident.
I think Tom doesn\'t know how to get to Mary\'s place.
She grows flowers such as tulips, pansies and daisies.
She spent most of her life taking care of poor people.
She tried to persuade him to buy her a pearl necklace.
Someone said something, but I could not understand it.
There\'s a movie I want to watch on TV tomorrow night.
There\'s not a whole lot happening here at the moment.
Would you like me to help you with washing the dishes?
